title: IP Address Tracker
description: The IP Address Tracker is a web application that allows users to track and visualize the location of IP addresses.

title: Weather App
description: The weather app is a web application that allows users to see realtime weather updates for any location.

title: Dictionary App
description: A dictionary web application that allows users to see different definitions of any word.

title: Age Calculator
description: Age Calculator: Instantly know your age in seconds. Simple, fast, and accurate.
